Book nerd, avid gamer, papercrafter, lover of sci-fi, and a helicopter parent to two cats. Writing and sending snail mail is a favored pastime, as is creative journaling.

I mainly post about FFXIV adventures, but occasionally about grief as well, and of course the occasional day to day. Welcome!

FFXIV: Aether: Adamantoise if you'd like to be friends!

Caius's carrd: Caius-Armatos.carrd.co

fields.name: PFP
fields.value: Peaches, a female highlander from FFXIV, sits comfortably atop a giant pumpkin, looking off camera and fitting the autumn vibe, with a deep orange dress, yellow and gold highlights, and hair dyed black and white. She is surrounded by a rainbow gradient

fields.name: Who is Caius?
fields.value: A male viera from FFXIV. His hair is long and dark with streaks of grey through it. His right eye has a scar cutting through it, and it is white in its blindness. His left is lavendar. Caius mains Black Mage and Bard and loves knitting sweaters and huggin
